name: HexaLife
description:
Welcome !

This is hexalife, a survival game, but not like any other. The game is all about hexagone, they are everywhere.

Current implemented features :

  • Fully "infinite" procedural world.
  • Different biomes, see screenshots for preview.
  • A biome temperature system.
  • A day / night cycle.

Planned features :

  • Survival elements.
  • Animals
  • Building.
  • Dungeons.
  • Biome blending.
  • Villages
  • Multiplayer

What you can expect later :

A survival / roguelike game based around a procedural hexagonal world. Trade with villagers, defend them. Complete dungeons & set up camp !

The game will soon have a pre-alpha, I just need to optimise it a bit more, and polish it a bit. This page will contain the experimental & stable releases of the game.

I will post regular devblogs & screenshots of the new features ! So be sure to follow the game to not miss anything !

If you like what you see, please consider following the game, or leaving a comment to show your interest !
